name: Metal Gear Solid - Digital Graphic Novel [PSP]
description:
Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel is an action game. It came out on 07-07-2011. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel is available on PSP.
Hideo Kojima and Motoyuki Yoshioka produced the game. It was directed by Hideo Kojima. It was scored by Hiroyuki Togo, Kazuki Muraoka, Lee Jeon Myung and Maki Kirioka.
